use.flag: Pull sys-fs/inotify-tools dependency for the cropping tool.
Bindings for H.264 video codec. It encodes fast.
Fraunhofer FDK AAC – best lossy audio codec for MP4, i.e. to use with H.264.
Bindings for VP9 video codec. It’s more efficient than H.264 and provides better quality, but with that it encodes slowly.
Opus audio codec. Best lossy audio codec. Can be used only in WebM, i.e. with VP9.
Vorbis audio codec. Second best for WebM. Can blow file size.
Check for updates on Github. Only shows a notification, doesn’t perform updates.
Pull in “time” utility to measure time spent on transcode.
Pull in GNU parallel to distribute jobs on several cores. Currently used only to speed up the decode and extraction of SSA subtitle attachments.
